title: Strengthening Healthcare Practical Skills: Differentiated Online Language Instructional Design Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and foundational knowledge in specialized domains (medical/legal/technical)
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners achieve at least a 20% improvement in language proficiency (knowledge, comprehension, application) through pre- and post-tests.
Learners increase the frequency of using metacognitive strategies (self-monitoring, planning, evaluation) by at least 15%.
Learners demonstrate a 25% or higher increase in post-test scores compared to pre-test scores on a language learning self-efficacy survey.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
